title: Prompt Engineering Basics
description: Learn essential techniques for writing effective prompts to get better results from LLMs.

sections.title: Principles of Good Prompts
sections.content:
# Principles of Good Prompts

## Be Clear and Specific

Vague: 'Write about AI'
Better: 'Write a 200-word explanation of how neural networks learn, suitable for high school students'

## Provide Context

Include background information the model needs to understand your request.

## Specify Format

Tell the model what format you want (bullet points, essay, code, etc.)

sections.title: Few-Shot Learning
sections.content:
# Few-Shot Learning

Provide examples to show the model what you want.

Example:
'Translate to French:
Hello -> Bonjour
Goodbye -> Au revoir
Thank you -> '

The model learns the pattern from examples.

summary: You've learned the fundamentals of prompt engineering.
